properties.name: mStorySubsystemClass
properties.comment: The collection containing the world bounds

properties.name: mTimeSubsystemClass
properties.comment: Subsystem to handle time of day.

properties.name: mRailroadSubsystemClass
properties.comment: Subsystem that handles the rail network, signals and all the trains in the game.

properties.name: mCircuitSubsystemClass
properties.comment: Subsystem that handles all the circuit simulations in the game, e.g. power grid.

properties.name: mSchematicManagerClass
properties.comment: Subsystem to handle all schematics and recipes in the game.

properties.name: mGamePhaseManagerClass
properties.comment: Subsystem to handle the game phase.

properties.name: mResearchManagerClass
properties.comment: Subsystem to handle all research (M.A.M.) done in the game

properties.name: mRadioactivitySubsystemClass
properties.comment: Subsystem that handles radioactivity in the world.

properties.name: mChatManagerClass
properties.comment: Subsystem that handles the chat messages.

properties.name: mCentralStorageSubsystemClass
properties.comment: Subsystem that handles the central storage.

properties.name: mBuildableSubsystemClass
properties.comment: Subsystem to manage all the buildables in the game.

properties.name: mFoliageRemovalSubsystemClass
properties.comment: Subsystem used to remove foliage on the map.

properties.name: mProximitySubsystemClass
properties.comment: Subsystem used to show effects near the player.

properties.name: mResourceSinkSubsystemClass
properties.comment: Subsystem that handles the resource sink system
